ğŸ‘¤ Biography
I am a graduate student at School of Artificial Intelligence of Nanjing University advised by Professor Yu-Feng Li (æå®‡å³°), and a member of LAMDA Group (æœºå™¨å­¦ä¹ ä¸æ•°æ®æŒ–æ˜ç ”ç©¶æ‰€), which is led by Professor Zhi-Hua Zhou (å‘¨å¿—å).
I received my B.Sc. degree from College of Computer Science & Technology, Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics in June 2024. In September of the same year, I was admitted to study for a M.Sc. degree at Nanjing University without an entrance examination.
